landing.bio: A proactive and eager learner from OAMK's International IT Degree in final study of web and mobile applications. Looking for opportunities as trainee positions to leverage ICT knowledge as well as thesis topics if applicable.

experience.aboutWork: I participated in OAMK's DevLab to develop solution for Global Goals with entrepreneur mindset. The workflow was iterative from incubating ideas and then designing and developing solutions as a business idea with prototypes which would be validated by tutors and judges from OAMK teachers and BusinessOulu. In the final project, my task was mainly focus as a project manager and UI/UX designer for REMY mobile application.

My most important responsibilities are to conduct classroom management, from documenting class activities to preparing teaching equipments, as well as provide side-teaching activities with students in need of support. The other tasks include following study progress and lesson progress of each individual.

education.description: Specialized in Web and Mobile Development and general of Internet Programming and Software Design
Specialized in Professional English used in Trading and Tourism field

projects.name: REMY
projects.origin: A mobile application of which idea and prototype incubated with teamEAT from OAMK's DevLab.
projects.target: The novel of REMY is to reduce household food waste in modern life with aid of mobile devices to manage food pantries and keep track expiration date with traffic light layout to raise awareness.
projects.extension: The final prototype was tested with 5 selected users and it added recipe list and shopping list features according to users' need.

projects.name: ReversiAI
projects.origin: A web application from summer project of OAMK to learn React.js as a UI framework.
projects.target: This web app would host Othello game with multiplayers. Player can choose to practice with machine algorithm.
projects.extension: To allow multiplayer features, there must be authentication and a leader board to update best players.

skills.name: Web developlement
skills.tool: HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, MySQL, Node.js

skills.name: UI & UX design
skills.tool: Figma Prototype, User Research, Usability Testing

awards.title: Connect with Finland project by KILKAS
